title: Council Decision of 14 May 1996 adopting a member and two alternates of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 14 May 1996
adopting a member and two alternates of the Advisory Committee on Education  and Training in the field of Architecture
(96/C  156/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE  EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mr Richard MARTIN is hereby appointed an alternate of the Advisory  Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Ms Anne-Marie RUELLE  for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 25 February 1999.
Mr Graziano TRIPPA is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Education  and Training in the field of Architecture for the period ending on 25 February 1999.
Mr Bruno MICHELIN is hereby appointed an alternate of the Advisory Committee on  Education and Training in the field of Architecture for the period ending on 25 February 1999.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 May 1996.
For the Council
The President
E. GUZZANTI
(1) OJ No L 223, 21.  8.  1985, p.  26.
(2) OJ No C 74, 14.  3.  1996, p. 1.
